messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

help needed sent friday february help needed hi please open ticket following statement thank you kind regards analyst en sent friday february help needed hello haven received any response issue need enter but somehow able enter for for rest week when try multiplies can delete those multiplied entries can submit sending you step by step you can what looks like best manager sent help needed hello have having problems with entering would kindly ask you help with please find attached problem occurs thank you best manager
